items.effect: +80 Chips if played hand contains a Flush

items.effect: X1 Mult for each empty Joker slot

items.name: Credit Card
items.effect: Go up to -$20 in debt

items.effect: When Blind is selected, destroy Joker to the right and permanently add double its sell value to this Mult

items.effect: +30 Chips for each remaining discard

items.effect: +15 Mult when 0 discards remaining

items.effect: Adds one Stone Card to deck when Blind is selected

1 in 4 chance for each played 8 to create a Tarot card when scored

items.name: Dusk

items.effect: Adds double the rank of lowest ranked card held in hand to Mult

items.name: Chaos the Clown
items.effect: 1 free Reroll per shop

items.name: Fibonacci
items.effect: Each played Ace, 2, 3, 5, or 8 gives +8 Mult when scored

items.name: Steel Joker
items.effect:
Gives X0.2 Mult for each Steel Card in your full deck
(Currently X1 Mult)
items.unlock_requirement: Available from start. (Can only appear in the shop when there is a Steel Card in the deck.)

items.name: Scary Face
items.effect: Played face cards give +30 Chips when scored

items.name: Abstract Joker
items.effect:
+3 Mult for each Joker card
(Currently +0 Mult)

items.effect: Earn $2 per discard if no discards are used by end of the round

items.name: Hack
items.effect: Retrigger each played 2, 3, 4, or 5

items.name: Pareidolia
items.effect: All cards are considered face cards

items.name: Gros Michel
items.effect: +15 Mult with 1 in 6 chance to be destroyed at end of round

items.name: Even Steven
items.effect: Played cards with even rank give +4 Mult when scored

items.name: Odd Todd
items.effect: Played cards with odd rank give +31 Chips when scored

items.name: Scholar
items.effect: Played Aces give +20 Chips and +4 Mult when scored

items.effect: Played face cards have a 1 in 2 chance to give $2 when scored

items.name: Supernova
items.effect: Adds the number of times poker hand has been played this run to Mult

items.name: Ride the Bus
items.effect: This Joker gains +1 Mult per consecutive hand played without a scoring face card

items.name: Space Joker
items.effect: 1 in 4 chance to upgrade level of played poker hand

items.name: Egg
items.effect: Gains $3 of sell value at end of round

items.name: Burglar
items.effect: When Blind is selected, gain +3 Hands and lose all discards

items.name: Blackboard
items.effect: X3 Mult if all cards held in hand are ♠️ Spades or ♣️ Clubs

items.name: Runner
items.effect: Gains +15 Chips if played hand contains a Straight

items.name: Ice Cream
items.effect: +100 Chips and -5 Chips for every hand played

items.name: DNA
items.effect: If first hand of round has only 1 card, add a permanent copy to deck and draw it to hand

items.name: Splash
items.effect: Every played card counts in scoring

items.name: Blue Joker
items.effect: +2 Chips for each remaining card in deck

items.name: Sixth Sense
items.effect: If first hand of round is a single 6, destroy it and create a Spectral card

items.name: Constellation
items.effect: This Joker gains X0.1 Mult for every Planet card used

items.name: Hiker
items.effect: Every played card permanently gains +5 Chips when scored

items.name: Faceless Joker
items.effect: Earn $5 if 3 or more face cards are discarded at the same time

items.name: Green Joker
items.effect: +1 Mult per hand played, -1 Mult per discard

items.name: Superposition
items.effect: Create a Tarot card if poker hand contains an Ace and a Straight

items.name: To Do List
items.effect: Earn $4 if poker hand is a [Poker Hand], poker hand changes at end of round

items.name: Cavendish
items.effect: X3 Mult with 1 in 1000 chance to be destroyed at end of round
items.unlock_requirement: Available from start. (Can only appear in the shop when Gros Michel has destroyed itself in the current run.)

items.name: Card Sharp
items.effect: X3 Mult if played poker hand has already been played this round

items.name: Red Card
items.effect: This Joker gains +3 Mult when any Booster Pack is skipped

items.name: Madness
items.effect: When Small Blind or Big Blind is selected, gain X0.5 Mult and destroy a random Joker

items.name: Square Joker

items.name: Séance

items.name: Riff-raff
items.effect: When Blind is selected, create 2 Common Jokers

items.effect: Gains x0.2 Mult per Enhanced card played, removed card Enhancement

items.name: Shortcut

items.name: Hologram
items.effect: Gains 0.25x Mult per playing card added to your deck

items.name: Vagabond
items.effect: Create a Tarot card if hand is played with $3 or less

items.name: Baron
items.effect: Each King held in hand gives x1.5 Mult

items.name: Cloud 9
items.effect: Earn $1 for each 9 in your full deck at end of round

items.name: Rocket
items.effect: Earn $1 at end of round. Payout increases by $2 when Boss Blind is defeated

items.name: Obelisk
items.effect: This Joker gains X0.2 Mult per consecutive hand played without playing your most played poker hand

items.name: Luchador
items.effect: Sell this card to disable the current Boss Blind

items.name: Photograph

items.name: Gift Card
items.effect: Add $1 of sell value to every Joker and Consumable card at end of round

items.name: Turtle Bean

items.name: Erosion
items.effect: +4 Mult for each card below [the deck's starting size] in your full deck

items.name: Reserved Parking

items.name: Mail-In Rebate
items.effect: Earn $5 for each discarded [rank], rank changes every round

items.name: To the Moon
items.effect: Earn an extra $1 of interest for every $5 you have at end of round

items.name: Hallucination
items.effect: 1 in 2 chance to create a Tarot card when any Booster Pack is opened

items.name: Fortune Teller
items.effect: +1 Mult per Tarot card used this run

items.name: Juggler
items.effect: +1 hand size

items.name: Drunkard
items.effect: +1 discard each round

items.effect: Gives +25 Chips for each Stone Card in your full deck

items.effect: Earn $4 at end of round

items.name: Lucky Cat
items.effect: This Joker gains X0.25 Mult every time a Lucky card successfully triggers

items.effect: +2 Chips for each $1 you have

items.name: Diet Cola
items.effect: Sell this card to create a free Double Tag

items.effect: If first discard of round has only 1 card, destroy it and earn $3

items.name: Flash Card
items.effect: +2 Mult per reroll in the shop

items.name: Popcorn
items.effect: +20 Mult -4 Mult per round played

items.name: Spare Trousers
items.effect: Gains +2 Mult if played hand contains a Two Pair

items.name: Ancient Joker
items.effect: Each played card with suit Suit gives x1.5 Mult when scored

items.name: Ramen
items.effect: x2 Mult, loses x0.01 Mult per card discarded

items.name: Walkie Talkie
items.effect: Each played 10 or 4 gives +10 Chips and +4 Mult

items.name: Seltzer
items.effect: Retrigger all cards played for the next 10 hands

items.name: Castle
items.effect: This Joker gains +3 Chips per discarded (suit)♠️ card, suit changes every round

items.name: Smiley Face
items.effect: Played face cards give +4 Mult when scored

items.name: Campfire
items.effect: This Joker gains x0.5 Mult for each card sold, resets when Boss Blind is defeated

items.name: Golden Ticket
items.effect: Played Gold cards earn $3 when scored
items.unlock_requirement: Play a 5 card hand that contains only Gold cards. (Can only appear in the shop when there is a Gold Card in the deck.)

items.name: Mr. Bones
items.effect: Prevents Death if chips scored are at least 25% of required chips

items.name: Acrobat
items.effect: x3 Mult on final hand of round

items.name: Sock and Buskin
items.effect: Retrigger all played face cards
items.unlock_requirement: Play a total of 300 face cards.

items.name: Swashbuckler
items.effect: Adds the sell value of all owned Jokers left of this card to Mult
items.unlock_requirement: Sell a total of 20 Joker cards.

items.name: Troubadour
items.effect: +2 hand size, -1 hands per round
items.unlock_requirement: Win 5 consecutive rounds by playing only 1 hand.

items.name: Certificate
items.effect: When round begins, add a random playing card with a random seal to your hand
items.unlock_requirement: Have a Gold playing card with a Gold Seal.

items.name: Smeared Joker
items.effect: ♥️ Hearts and ♦️ Diamonds count as the same suit, ♠️ Spades and ♣️ Clubs count as the same suit
items.unlock_requirement: Have at least 3 Wild Cards in your deck.

items.name: Throwback
items.effect: X0.25 Mult for each Blind skipped this run
items.unlock_requirement: Continue a saved run from the main menu.

items.name: Hanging Chad
items.effect: Retrigger first played card used in scoring 2 additional times
items.unlock_requirement: Beat a Boss Blind with a High Card.

items.name: Rough Gem
items.effect: Played cards with ♦️ Diamond suit earn $1 when scored
items.unlock_requirement: Have at least 30 ♦️ in your deck.

items.name: Bloodstone
items.effect: 1 in 2 chance for played cards with ♥️ Heart suit to give X1.5 Mult when scored
items.unlock_requirement: Have at least 30 ♥️ in your deck.

items.name: Arrowhead
items.effect: Played cards with ♠️ Spade suit give +50 Chips when scored
items.unlock_requirement: Have at least 30 ♠️ in your deck.

items.name: Onyx Agate
items.effect: Played cards with ♣️ Club suit give +7 Mult when scored
items.unlock_requirement: Have at least 30 ♣️ in your deck.

items.name: Glass Joker
items.effect: This Joker gains X0.75 Mult for every Glass Card that is destroyed
items.unlock_requirement: Have 5 or more Glass cards in your deck. (Can only appear in the shop when there is a Glass Card in the deck.)

items.name: Showman
items.effect: Joker, Tarot, Planet, and Spectral cards may appear multiple times

items.name: Flower Pot
items.effect: X3 Mult if played hand has a scoring ♦️ Diamond card, ♣️ Club card, ♥️ Heart card, and ♠️ Spade card

items.name: Blueprint
items.effect: Copies ability of Joker to the right

items.name: Wee Joker
items.effect: This Joker gains +8 Chips when each played 2 is scored
items.unlock_requirement: Win a run in 18 or fewer rounds.

items.name: Merry Andy
items.effect: +3 discards, -1 hand size
items.unlock_requirement: Win a run in 12 or fewer rounds.

items.name: Oops! All 6s
items.effect: Doubles all probabilities
items.unlock_requirement: Earn at least 10,000 Chips in a single hand.

items.name: The Idol
items.effect: Each played [Card] gives X2 Mult when scored, Card changes every round
items.unlock_requirement: In one hand, earn at least 1,000,000 Chips.

items.name: Seeing Double
items.effect: X2 Mult if played hand has a scoring ♣️ Club card and a scoring card of any other suit
items.unlock_requirement: Play a hand that contains four 7 of ♣️.

items.name: Matador
items.effect: Earn $8 if played hand triggers the Boss Blind ability
items.unlock_requirement: Defeat a Boss Blind in one hand, without using discards.

items.name: Hit the Road
items.effect: This Joker gains X0.5 Mult per discarded Jack this round
items.unlock_requirement: Discard 5 Jacks at the same time.

items.name: The Duo
items.effect: X2 Mult if the played hand contains a Pair
items.unlock_requirement: Win a run without playing a Pair.

items.name: The Trio
items.effect: X3 Mult if played hand contains a Three of a Kind
items.unlock_requirement: Win a run without playing a Three of a Kind.

items.name: The Family
items.effect: X4 Mult if played hand contains a Four of a Kind
items.unlock_requirement: Win a run without playing a Four of a Kind.

items.name: The Order
items.effect: X3 Mult if played hand contains a Straight
items.unlock_requirement: Win a run without playing a Straight.

items.name: The Tribe
items.effect: X3 Mult if played hand contains a Flush
items.unlock_requirement: Win a run without playing a Flush.

items.name: Stuntman
items.effect: +250 Chips, -2 hand size
items.unlock_requirement: Earn at least 100 million (100,000,000) Chips in a single hand.

items.name: Invisible Joker
items.effect: After 2 rounds, sell this card to Duplicate a random Joker
items.unlock_requirement: Win a game while never having more than 4 jokers.

items.name: Brainstorm
items.effect: Copies the ability of leftmost Joker

items.name: Satellite
items.effect: Earn $1 at end of round per unique Planet card used this run

items.name: Shoot the Moon
items.effect: Each Queen held in hand gives +13 Mult
items.unlock_requirement: Play every ♥️ card in your deck in one round.

items.name: Driver's License
items.effect: X3 Mult if you have at least 16 Enhanced cards in your full deck

items.name: Cartomancer
items.effect: Create a Tarot card when Blind is selected

items.name: Astronomer
items.effect: All Planet cards and Celestial Packs in the shop are free

items.name: Burnt Joker
items.effect: Upgrade the level of the first Discarded poker hand each round

items.name: Bootstraps
items.effect: +2 Mult for every $5 you have
items.unlock_requirement: Have at least 2 Polychrome Jokers at the same time.

items.name: Canio
items.effect: Gain X1 Mult when a face card is destroyed

items.name: Triboulet
items.effect: Played Kings and Queens each give X2 Mult when scored
items.unlock_requirement: Find this Joker from the Soul card.

items.name: Yorick
items.effect: X5 Mult only after using 23 Discards
items.unlock_requirement: Find this Joker from the Soul card.

items.name: Chicot
items.effect: Disables effect of every Boss Blind
items.unlock_requirement: Find this Joker from the Soul card.

items.name: Perkeo

items.unlock_requirement: Find this Joker from the Soul card.
